product_name: TYLT TYLT ENERGI Sliding Power Case - iPhone 5
long_description: The sleek TYLT ENERGI sliding power case envelops your iPhone 5 in svelte, solid protection and adds up to 9 hours of talk time with its own built-in battery. Use the slim-line protective plastic case alone when you want to travel light; slide on the exterior battery case when your phone needs a charge. Rechargeable 2,500mAh battery will keep your iPhone 5 powered throughout the day. Charge, sync, transfer data and listen to music with the case on. LED status indicator lights. In the box: battery dock, two slim-line cases (1 black, 1 colored), micro-USB charging cable and user guide.
short_description: The sleek TYLT ENERGI sliding power case envelops your iPhone 5 in svelte, solid protection and adds up to 9 hours of talk time with its own built-in battery.
